Summary: On a very clear dark night we were able to see an unlit crescent shaped craft fly over.
divs: sighting detailswe live a couple of blocks from the bay in fulton,texas. on october 3rd we were walking home from a restaurant on the water when i stopped for a few minutes to just look at the stars.as i was looking up an unlit crescent shaped craft flew directly above us. it had no lights and i think it must have been flying fairly low so that the city lights reflected back from it ever so slightly. it was there long enough for me to say to my husband "oh my god...look it's right there, it doesn't have any lights" and he looked up and saw it too. it was at least the size of my hand at arms length;as i said either very low or very large. it made no sound. it flew at about the same speed as maybe a helicopter would-not too fast or slow. we just watched it go out of sight travelling in a west\north-westerly direction. i don't know if it's related but moments before i saw the craft i had seen a shooting star over in the same direction that the craft came from. the day after i saw it i called nuforc who told me to make an internet report-we didn't have a computer then so i went to the library a week or two later and submitted a report. after all the january texas sightings i wondered whether i might need to let mufon know about what we saw back in october. it might be important for the ones who know what's really going on to know that whoever flys the crescent shaped craft were here doing whatever it is they do on october 3rd 2007.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fulton
This sighting has never been favorited.
